projects.title: End-to-End Project of JSON Scripts + SQL (MongoDB + SQL Server)
projects.description: Comprehensive financial compliance system integrating third-party screening API for automated background verification. Features real-time sanctions screening, multi-database architecture (MongoDB + SQL Server).
projects.detailed_description: Professional financial compliance platform developed for background screening using third-party screening API with comprehensive database integration. The system performs real-time sanctions and watchlist screening for individuals and organizations, featuring advanced data matching algorithms (from the company), parallel processing capabilities, and multi-database architecture supporting both MongoDB and SQL Server. Successfully processed multiple organizations with high API success rate and reliable performance metrics.
features: Third-party screening API integration with secure HMAC-SHA256 authentication
Multi-database architecture supporting MongoDB and SQL Server
Real-time sanctions and watchlist screening for individuals and organizations
Advanced data matching algorithms with high accuracy performance
Parallel processing capabilities for high-volume data operations
Automated case creation and management system
Comprehensive audit logging and error handling
Cross-database data synchronization and matching
Production-ready workflow with retry mechanisms and rate limiting
Complete organization screening workflow with case tracking
projects.readme: Professional financial compliance system with Refinitiv API integration, multi-database support, and PowerBI Dashboard.

screenshots.caption: System architecture showing multi-database integration and API workflow
Data matching results showing performance metrics

key_metrics.label: API Success Rate
key_metrics.description: Reliable case creation and processing workflow

key_metrics.label: Data Matching Performance
key_metrics.description: Efficient similarity matching between database tables

projects.title: Gender Discrimination Lawsuit Statistical Analysis
projects.description: Comprehensive legal analytics project using R to analyze gender discrimination claims in academic medical institutions. Applied advanced statistical modeling, hypothesis testing, and machine learning techniques to examine salary and promotion patterns across 261 faculty records for court case evidence.
projects.detailed_description: Real-world legal analytics project analyzing gender discrimination claims at Houston College of Medicine using comprehensive statistical methods in R. The analysis examined 261 faculty records across 6 departments, applying multiple statistical techniques including linear regression, logistic regression, ANOVA, t-tests, and machine learning feature importance analysis. Served as expert analytics consultant providing evidence-based conclusions for court proceedings, demonstrating practical application of statistical analysis in legal contexts.
features: Analysis of 261 faculty records across 6 medical departments
Multi-variable statistical modeling for salary and promotion patterns
Advanced data visualization with ggplot2 for court presentation
Hypothesis testing using t-tests and ANOVA for gender differences
Linear and logistic regression with feature importance analysis
Machine learning classification using caret package
Statistical evidence preparation for legal proceedings
Comprehensive correlation analysis and model diagnostics
projects.readme: Statistical analysis of gender discrimination in academic medical institutions using R and advanced statistical methods for legal evidence.

screenshots.caption: Salary distribution analysis by gender and department
Hypothesis testing results and statistical significance
Machine learning feature importance for promotion prediction

projects.title: Financial Chatbot Services
projects.description: Flask web application project built during coursework with AI integration for financial advice and market data visualization. Implemented basic user authentication and API connections as part of learning full-stack development.
projects.detailed_description: Academic group project developing a Flask-based financial application with AI features. Learned to integrate Google Gemini AI API for basic financial advice responses and connected Alpha Vantage API for market data display. Implemented user login functionality and simple form validation. Project helped understand web development concepts including routing, templates, and API consumption during final semester coursework.
features: AI-powered financial advisory system with personalized investment recommendations
Real-time stock market data visualization and financial news integration
24/7 AI customer support chatbot with conversation history tracking
Advanced user authentication system with rate limiting and session security
Modular Flask blueprint architecture for scalable code organization
Investment simulation tools with compound interest calculations
Responsive web design with professional UI/UX implementation
Enterprise-grade error handling and fallback data systems
API integration with comprehensive timeout and retry mechanisms
Professional deployment configuration with Gunicorn and Gevent
challenges: Integrating multiple external APIs (Google Gemini AI, Alpha Vantage) with robust error handling
Implementing secure user authentication and session management with rate limiting
Designing scalable Flask application architecture using blueprint patterns
Creating responsive real-time data updates without overwhelming API rate limits
Balancing AI response quality with performance optimization and timeout handling
Ensuring data integrity and graceful degradation when external services are unavailable

screenshots.caption: Real-time market data dashboard with live stock prices and financial news
AI financial advisor interface with personalized investment recommendations
Flask blueprint architecture and AI integration system design
